author: Gabriel Kelly
comment: There aren't any adjustable settings and so I can't calibrate the tuner to the frequency I use. I received no response from the developer when inquiring how to enter settings.

reply.author: TORTATO
reply.content: Hi Gabriel, We search and found no question about your request, but we are working to in a feature to user calibrate the frequency. I will contact you on this channel when this feature be published.

title: There is no way to calibrate the tuner.
